message: The lifts are out of order between platforms 5 & 6 and the main concourse at Gatwick Airport station.
Trains running between East Croydon and Clapham Junction may be cancelled or delayed by up to 60 minutes. More details can be found in Latest Travel News
Trains running through Redhill may be cancelled or delayed by up to 30 minutes. More details can be found in Latest Travel News.
